title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 709 - Determination Of Public Need For Medical Facility Construction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 709 - Determination Of Public Need For Medical Facility Construction

State Regulations
§ 709.1 - Determination of public need pursuant to section 2802 of the public health law
§ 709.2 - Acute care facilities
§ 709.3 - Residential health care facility beds
§ 709.4 - End stage renal dialysis service
§ 709.5 - Ambulatory surgery services
§ 709.6 - Extracorporeal shockwave lithotripters
§ 709.7 - Liver transplantation services
§ 709.8 - Bone marrow transplantation (bmt) services
§ 709.9 - Human heart transplantation services
§ 709.11 - Inpatient rehabilitation programs for traumatic brain-injured patients
§ 709.12 - Need methodology for acquisition of magnetic resonance imagers
§ 709.13 - Adult day health-care programs
§ 709.14 - Cardiac services
§ 709.15 - Repealed
§ 709.16 - Therapeutic radiology or radiation oncology
§ 709.17 - Long-term ventilator beds

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 709

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§2801-a, 2803

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
